gdacollab_microgamejamcontroller.name: MicrogameJamController
gdacollab_microgamejamcontroller.description: Controller for Microgame Jam supported games.

test-property.name: Test property
test-property.desc: A test number property. Displayed by 'Alert' action.

aceCategories.endingGame: Controls to either win or lose the game
aceCategories.gameParameters: Control/Access parameters from the Microgame Jam

win-game.description: Win the game in the context of the Microgame Jam.

lose-game.description: Lose the game in the context of the Microgame Jam.

set-max-timer.description: Set a maximum of seconds for the player to play your game before they automatically lose. Should be called at the start of the game.

maxSeconds.name: Max Seconds
maxSeconds.desc: Maximum number of seconds to set (maximum you can set is 20).

get-lives.description: Get the number of lives the player has.

get-difficulty.description: Get the current difficulty setting from the Microgame Jam. Difficulty is between 1 and 3.

get-timer.description: Get the number of seconds until the player automatically loses the game.

get-max-timer.description: Get the maximum number of seconds the player is allowed to play for before automatically losing.
